description:
A tutor from a war-torn country and her young charge take refuge in Japan, but secret agents are on their trail.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaki wa Tokudane! Kiken na Kuni no Mokkori Bijin
Kids Get Special Treatment. A Beautiful Lady from a Dangerous Land
子供(ガキ)は得だね! 危険な国のモッコリ美人
